title: Replace elevator cables
description: Replace frayed cables in the elevators to prevent accidents and improve safety.

title: Fix elevator doors
description: Repair and adjust elevator doors to ensure smooth and safe operation.

title: Upgrade elevator control system
description: Upgrade the elevator control system to improve efficiency and reduce downtime.

title: Clean and lubricate elevator parts
description: Clean and lubricate elevator parts to prevent wear and tear and extend their lifespan.

title: Install new elevator buttons
description: Install new elevator buttons with braille and audio features to improve accessibility for disabled students and staff.

title: Improve elevator lighting
description: Upgrade elevator lighting to improve visibility and enhance the overall user experience.

title: Replace damaged elevator flooring
description: Replace damaged elevator flooring to prevent trips and falls.

title: Install emergency phone system in elevators
description: Install an emergency phone system in elevators for quick response in case of emergencies.

title: Conduct regular elevator inspections
description: Conduct regular elevator inspections to ensure compliance with safety regulations and identify issues before they become major problems.

title: Train elevator technicians
description: Train elevator technicians to keep up-to-date with the latest technologies and maintenance practices.
